root.name: Mansion of Hidden Souls
root.description: Mansion of Hidden Souls was a game developed by Vic Tokai, Inc. originally for the Sega CD attachment to the Sega Genesis. The game was later released for the Sega Saturn console. It was an adventure game that used pre-rendered polygonal full motion video (FMV) graphics. The game's gameplay elements were similar to other FMV adventure games of the time like Myst or D and mostly consisted of puzzle solving.The player's sister laments that she wishes to be a butterfly and then dissapears. As a result the player must explore a mysterious mansion to look for the lost sister. Coincidentally, the mansion is infested by butterflies. Through the course of the game the player must solves puzzles during the search for the little girl.The game marketed itself as a scary or frightening game, but ultimately the games never really brought on the scares, especially in light of other games of the time like Alone in the Dark and Resident Evil.
